channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Ex-FBI Director Comey has been indicted. And, Hegseth summons military leaders
item.description: Ex-FBI Director James Comey indicted on criminal charges after Trump pressured the DOJ to investigate. And, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth calls unusual meeting of top military commanders.
item.content:encoded:
Ex-FBI Director James Comey indicted on criminal charges after Trump pressured the DOJ to investigate. And, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth calls unusual meeting of top military commanders.

(Image credit: Alex Edelman)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: There was no rapture this week, so the quiz returns. Can you score a perfect 11?
item.description: This week, Jimmy Kimmel returned, a weird statue vanished and no one (to our knowledge) got snatched up to heaven.
item.content:encoded: This week, Jimmy Kimmel returned, a weird statue vanished and no one (to our knowledge) got snatched up to heaven.
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris

item.title: What schools stand to lose in the battle over the next federal education budget
item.description: Education researchers warn budget proposals from the White House and House Republicans would impose steep cuts on some of the nation's most vulnerable students and disadvantaged school communities.
item.content:encoded: Education researchers warn budget proposals from the White House and House Republicans would impose steep cuts on some of the nation's most vulnerable students and disadvantaged school communities.
item.dc:creator: Cory Turner

item.title: Trump's Tylenol warning echoes past misconceptions about mothers and autism
item.description: Medical scholars say, efforts to find a singular cause for autism has historically led to scrutinizing parents and fueling stigma about autism
item.content:encoded:
Medical scholars say, efforts to find a singular cause for autism has historically led to scrutinizing parents and fueling stigma about autism

(Image credit: Photo Illustration by Justin Sullivan)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: Fired feds, Trump lovers and veterans: Meet the people applying for ICE jobs
item.description: At a recent DHS career expo in Provo, Utah, many attendees hoped to get hired to help with the Trump administration's deportation efforts.
item.content:encoded:
At a recent DHS career expo in Provo, Utah, many attendees hoped to get hired to help with the Trump administration's deportation efforts.

(Image credit: George Frey)
item.dc:creator: Ximena Bustillo

item.title: Trump's TikTok deal payment criticized as 'shakedown scheme' by experts
item.description: The U.S. government will collect a multibillion-dollar fee from the American investors who will take over TikTok. Some experts call the fee and other deals like it "extortion."
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. government will collect a multibillion-dollar fee from the American investors who will take over TikTok. Some experts call the fee and other deals like it "extortion."

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn

item.title: LA County response to deadly fires slowed by lack of resources, report says
item.description: A report released Thursday found that series of weaknesses, including "outdated policies, inconsistent practices and communications vulnerabilities," slowed the response to the January fires.
item.content:encoded:
A report released Thursday found that series of weaknesses, including "outdated policies, inconsistent practices and communications vulnerabilities," slowed the response to the January fires.

(Image credit: Nic Coury)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Human remains identified as Travis Decker, wanted for killing his daughters
item.description: Decker, an ex-soldier, was wanted for the murder of his three young daughters after they were found dead near a campground in June.
item.content:encoded:
Decker, an ex-soldier, was wanted for the murder of his three young daughters after they were found dead near a campground in June.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Trump to place import taxes on drugs, home furnishings and heavy trucks
item.description: President Trump said he will put import taxes of 100% on pharmaceutical drugs, 50% on kitchen cabinets and bathroom vanities, 30% on upholstered furniture and 25% on heavy trucks starting on Oct. 1.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump said he will put import taxes of 100% on pharmaceutical drugs, 50% on kitchen cabinets and bathroom vanities, 30% on upholstered furniture and 25% on heavy trucks starting on Oct. 1.

(Image credit: Michael Probst)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Ex-FBI Director James Comey indicted on criminal charges stemming from 2020 testimony
item.description: Comey faces one count of making false statements and one count of obstruction of justice in connection.
item.content:encoded:
Comey faces one count of making false statements and one count of obstruction of justice in connection.

(Image credit: Chip Somodevilla)
item.dc:creator: Carrie Johnson
